title: give up dragon
body:
And go get baron! Played as nunu, got first drag 6 minutes into game, got second drag the second it spawned, enemy team was in position for third, but I told my team to let them had it , to go get baron instead. Enemy realized our plan and stopped doing drag to rush baron. We got baron waaaaaay before they could get to us, and aced then had team push while I went for drag. We grouped after and won. EZ game. Just a little tip for other junglers, play mind games with objectives . By showing the enemy that I was going to get dragon every time it spawned, they believed I would do it a third time. Never expecting the sneaky baron. Huehuehue nunu es numero uno!
Also listen to shot callers. They probably know what they're talking about. Unless it's the adc then he probably just wants to play death match :P

replies.body: It worked once, it must work every time!
It actually has worked like 7. I just don't try it often because teams don't listen

> [{quoted}](name=itachihatake,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=QIIHeowc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-16T18:49:28.624+0000)
>
> It actually has worked like 7. I just don't try it often because teams don't listen

*Shrug*

Thing is, 1 person can solo dragon while 4 can stall a baron. It's a trick play that works if they don't have vision of you, but I wouldn't make it a standard play.
Good point. But idk I honestly don't trust my team enough. There's always that one idiot who sees an opening, and goes in without remembering he's supposed to stall . EVERY TIME.
what are u  going to do with baron? can u push it with it? if not no point getting it just deny them getting it
